## What is Friends?

Friends is an American television sitcom created by _David Crane_ and _Marta Kauffman_, which aired on NBC from September 22, 1994, to May 6, 2004, lasting ten seasons. With an ensemble cast starring _Jennifer Aniston_, _Courteney Cox_, _Lisa Kudrow_, _Matt LeBlanc_, _Matthew Perry_ and _David Schwimmer_, the show revolves around six friends in their 20s and 30s who live in Manhattan, New York City.
